content.heading: About HCN Capital

children.text: HCN Group AB’s goal is to create shareholder value by maximizing the long-term asset value per share. The strategy to achieve this goal is described below.

content.heading: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur
content.label: Our Vision

children.text: HCN Group AB is working continuously to identify new investments. We have no geographical limitations and are prepared to invest in a variety of industries, with the reservation that our expertise and network can contribute to the company’s continued growth. Furthermore, it is important that the company has a clear growth potential, so we can actively support the company on its journey.

content.heading: Extraordinary return through unique deal flow and engagement model
content.label: Our Vision

children.text: As former entrepreneurs and founders of multiple successful businesses, the team has a unique access and ability to work side-by-side with other entrepreneurs to supercharge their businesses by optimizing their business as well as their access to capital
The fund provides a process that allows entrepreneurs of portfolio companies to leverage the cumulative experience of the core fund team and fund advisers

We are building a new type of investment company which provides a library of proven strategy and tactics ranging from marketing, sales, funding, technology and operations that the portfolio companies can leverage to fortify and accelerate their business
This model should give extraordinary returns to all stakeholders (investors, entrepreneurs, portfolio company employees)

content.heading: Stay up to date with the HCN Capital Newsletter
content.subtitle: Follow our news as it happens

content.heading: Unique positioning leveraging the strength of the team
content.label: Strategy and Objectives

children.text: The fund focuses on
equity investments in private companies
It seeks to democratize access
to a broad portfolio of world-class smaller companies at preferential deal terms driven by HCN’s founding team’s entrepreneurial track record
It aims to provide
strong  liquidity
from day one in active collaboration with secondary market platforms
Provide diversification

across sectors where the team has experience and a strong network to evaluate and add value; the fund also seeks diversification across company maturity (early-stage, growth capital, stable cash flow) and geographic regions.

content.heading: Investment Focus
content.label: Set up for global success

children.text: Our focus is on investing in and building companies that will become high-value, market-moving, category-defining global businesses
Geographic focus is on Europe
(primarily UK and Northwestern Europe) and
North America
Portfolio companies will need to meet at least one of the following profiles:
Companies with strong customer metrics and good FCF who need
growth capital
to go global and have not raised institutional capital so far
Early-stage companies with proven product-market fit that have shown a J-curve ramp and now need
venture capital
to continue to grow
Early-stage companies with proven entrepreneurs and concepts that align with the team’s experience and network and who require
seed capital

content.label: Portfolio Holdings

content.heading: Inuheat

children.text: Inuheat is an innovative ingredient brand company that offers wearable heating technology to the global clothing industry.

Inuheat Wearable Heating Platform (IWHP) can make it easy to integrate active heating into textile products. Today, Inuheat offers its heating solution to leading global clothing companies Inuheat chooses to focus purely on developing an excellent heating system and to drive this development further than anyone else.

It’s a simple business idea: With the market’s best wearable heating system, implemented in clothes from the best-known clothing brands, you get the most attractive products for outdoors, sports and work professionals. Helping large customer groups that need to be comfortably warm in cold and harsh environments.

IWHP offers a complete system for wearable heating, with all parts needed to easily design, produce and distribute top quality heated garments. The Inuheat Online cloud-based management service offers partners within IWHP direct access to garment data and statistics, together with CRS, like post sales activities and more.

content.heading: Vincent & Scales

children.text: Vincent & Scales is shaped by their passion for watchmaking, mechanical engineering, and craftsmanship.

Founded in Bjärred, Sweden in 2015, Vincent & Scales is shaped by our passion for watchmaking, mechanical engineering, and craftsmanship – three elements that blend together to form the foundation of a truly independent watchmaking company.

Our focus is designing and creating high quality mechanical timepieces, engineered and refined with precision. Perfection, passion, and mechanical art, is the essence of our designs. The watches are carefully assembled by hand, based on traditional craftsmanship and classic mechanical engineering, methods refined by artisan watchmakers over a century.
Before they are delivered to our customers, all of our watches undergo a thorough and demanding quality control process, which is capped by a third-party chronometer certification.
Vincent & Scales is shaped by their passion for watchmaking, mechanical engineering, and craftsmanship.

Daniel Grasman has been at the forefront of digital innovation for multiple decades. He has been active in advising and raising capital for private companies as well as venture capital funds. He has served in senior strategy and business development roles at global corporations including RELX and SAP and was the co-founder of an early fintech pioneer. He spent nearly a decade in equity research and portfolio management at two large investment management firms.
He is a former Fulbright Fellow, holds an MBA from Harvard University and an MS in Engineering from Stanford University.

Staffan Bergqvist has deep knowledge of and experience in entrepreneurship and investments which started with the investment and the establishment of Enzymatica AB in 2007. HCN Group AB as a holding company was founded in 2011 and has been involved in the listing of 8 companies on different markets.

HCN Group AB is a shareholder of six listed holdings and helps them achieve continued growth and create value for their shareholders. The guiding principles of the fund are true business acumen, commitment, dialogue and a low cost profile.

Jostein Svendsen is a Norwegian serial entrepreneur having started more than 10 companies globally, with an impressive track record in exits. His companies has resulted in multiple IPOs or trade sales.

He has started two globally leading digital agencies which both went public in Stockholm. Three Fintechs including one online stockbroker (UK), one bank (Nordic) and one credit card company (UK). He also helped to build a globally successful SaaS business in Silicon Valley.
